text: Mohammed Kadharsha (born October 6, 1935) is an Indian politician from the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam. He served as a member of the Rajya Sabha from April 3, 1974 to April 2, 1980 and July 25, 1983 to July 24, 1989. == Family == Kadharsha was born on October 6, 1935 to K. Mohammed and has studied up to graduation. Kadharsha is married to Laila Kadharsha. The couple has two sons and two daughters. == References == == External links == * Category:1935 births Category:Living people
title: M. Kadharsha
